title: The Disappeared Reappear
outcome: The Vanished—citizens erased from the BCI—reemerge publicly, immune to system detection. They organize a parallel society offering aid and trade outside the BCI. The Council is shaken, as some officials secretly contact the Vanished for help. The shadow society's success threatens to supplant official control.

events.description: Vanished citizens publicly reappear, demonstrating new immunity to BCI scanning and system protocols. Crowds gather in awe and confusion.
The Vanished organize mutual aid and services for those seeking escape from the BCI. Their society grows quickly, functioning openly and offering shelter from Council monitoring.
Ordinary citizens and even some lower-level officials quietly seek help from the Vanished, trading information and resources for safety outside the BCI's reach.
Council analyses show the Vanished's 'shadow city' is thriving, with BCI compliance dropping where they operate. Some officials discreetly negotiate with their leaders.
